Other News

February 19, 2021   It's a new year, and the website and our newsletter have new updates. Check out
the November and February issues, and be sure to add our Events calendar!

October 16, 2020   Hello World. The MPC site has a new look, and will soon™ be populated with news
about music production at MIT. Expect relative chaos with this website for the next couple of months.
